DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to evaluate the effects of thyroid functions on energy homeostasis and inflammation.
DOC.brief_title: The Association Between Autoimmune or Inflammation and Thyroid Disease
DOC.detailed_description: The subjects were enrolled for evaluation of thyroid functions. The associations between thyroid function and energy homeostasis and inflammation will be assessed.
DOC.criteria: Subjects visits outpatient department due to a suspicion of thyroid disease Psychological disorders, severe inflammatory or infection diseases.
